backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining video, user, playlist, and AI-studio image types plus maps for storage, with initial logic for saving and retrieving user-owned saved images using access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing AI‑studio image workflow, client‑side generation, and backend persistence features with related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries for all frontend files describing their roles in navigation, UI, hooks, and new AI‑studio image features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx with favicon and meta tags.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling routing, authentication, Stripe checks, page rendering, and global state such as search, selected items, and sidebar state.
frontend/src/components/AddToPlaylistDia: Dialog component allowing authenticated users to add a video to an existing or newly created playlist with creation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/ai-studio/Images: AI Studio section managing image generation, upload, promo editing, and library saving with tabbed UI.
frontend/src/components/ai-studio/PromoC: Canvas tool for composing promo images with text, erasing, downloading, and saving functionality.
frontend/src/components/ai-studio/SavedI: Displays saved promo images with previews, tags, delete actions, and the ability to reopen images for editing.
frontend/src/components/AiEditDialog.tsx: Renders a dialog showing AI-generated title, description, and tag suggestions and lets users apply them individually or all at once.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Provides the main layout with header, sidebar, footer, and content area, wiring navigation and search props throughout.
frontend/src/components/CommentSection.t: Manages displaying, adding, deleting, and pinning comments with authentication and subscription checks, including sorting pinned comments first.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a footer with branding, a caffeine.ai link, and an optional navigation button to YouTubeMe.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with search, authentication via Internet Identity, navigation controls, and subscription indicators.
frontend/src/components/InternetIdentity: Shows a help dialog explaining Internet Identity sign-in methods and allows users to continue or cancel login.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Displays a modal requesting the user’s name and saves the initial profile with default subscription status.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Sidebar component showing navigation buttons based on authentication, subscription status, and current page, with mobile toggle handling.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Admin-only modal for configuring Stripe keys and allowed countries, followed by optional payout destination setup.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: Displays a video thumbnail, title, uploader, stats, and tags, with click handlers for video and channel navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing identity loading, login, and logout using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as profiles, AI stats, purchases, and chat messages.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AiChatRoomPage.tsx: Displays a real-time AI chat room where authenticated users can view and send messages.
frontend/src/pages/AiGenerationPaymentCa: Shows a cancellation notice for AI Studio payment with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/AiGenerationPaymentSu: Verifies a Stripe session and shows success or error UI for AI Studio purchase activation.
frontend/src/pages/AiStudioPage.tsx: AI Studio UI for generating videos or images with quotes, backgrounds, time limits, and purchase checks.
frontend/src/pages/ChannelPage.tsx: Displays a user's channel and videos with options to create or edit channel details.
frontend/src/pages/CreatorStudioPage.tsx: Authenticated creator dashboard showing uploaded videos with management and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoverPage.tsx: Discover hub linking to AI Studio, AI Chat Room, and an external YouTube‑style site.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadPaymentFailur: Shows a payment‑cancelled message with navigation back to the video or home.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadPaymentSucces: Verifies purchase on load and shows success or error status with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays all videos or search results with loading states, empty states, and links to AI Studio and AI Chat Room.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment-cancelled message with options to return home or retry checkout.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Verifies Stripe payment status, updates user subscription, and shows success or failure states.
frontend/src/pages/PlaylistDetailPage.ts: Fetches a playlist and displays its videos with loading and empty states, including navigation back to playlists.
frontend/src/pages/PlaylistsPage.tsx: Lists the user's playlists, supports creating new ones, and handles unauthenticated and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionPage.tsx: Shows subscription options, checks Stripe configuration, and starts a checkout session for premium access.
frontend/src/pages/UploadPage.tsx: Upload page for selecting videos, trimming, adding metadata, and submitting uploads with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/VideoEditPage.tsx: Video editing page allowing metadata updates, thumbnail changes, tag management, and AI-based edit suggestions.
frontend/src/pages/VideoPlayerPage.tsx: Video playback page showing video details, comments, likes, view tracking, and purchase/download options.
frontend/src/pages/YouTubeMePage.tsx: Static informational page describing the YouTubeMe.co platform and its features.
frontend/src/utils/aiEditHeuristics.ts: Implements simple local heuristics to auto-improve titles, descriptions, and tags for videos.
frontend/src/utils/aiImageGenerator.ts: Client-side canvas-based pseudo-AI image generator supporting multiple styles and progress updates.
frontend/src/utils/aiVideoGenerator.ts: Generates WebM videos client‑side using Canvas and MediaRecorder with resolution capping and fallback handling.
frontend/src/utils/canvasExport.ts: Provides helpers to export a canvas as PNG, get data URLs/blob URLs, and load images from files.
frontend/src/utils/contentPolicy.ts: Checks text for blocked explicit-content keywords and returns policy messages.
frontend/src/utils/fetchImageFromUrl.ts: Fetches and validates remote images via CORS, ensuring proper URL format and image content type.
frontend/src/utils/networkGuards.ts: Local-only operation guards that log and optionally validate absence of external network calls.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing MeTube features, scope, policies, and architectural notes.
